content_html: Gandaki, Sept 11: Chief Minister of Gandaki Province, Surendra Raj Pandey, has spoken the need to strengthen social unity and harmony while finding a new course ahead. Issuing a statement today, the Chief Minister said that social unity and harmony are unique features of Nepali society, and the time
